item.description:
Newport Polo is always a fun time.  Its as much about socializing as it is watching the actual match.

2011 marks the 20th anniversary season of the Newport International Polo Series. All the stops have been pulled out to celebrate this milestone fittingly, with an all-star lineup of international competitors including the debuts of Kenya and Brazil, a City Series featuring US rivals and many festive events coordinated for fun on and off the field. This match, on Sept. 10, will be vs. Washington DC.

The match starts at 4pm, and gates open at noon.  It's full tailgating, so small grills, your own food and beverages are all allowed - if not encouraged! If you'd like to bring something to share please note it in your RSVP. Leashed dogs are also allowed as long as you clean up after them.

This meetup is being planned with the Newport Meetup Group and co-coordinated with our super member, Alan. He reserved a $30 tailgating spot, so a few bucks from each person for that would be appreciated.   Note - The tailgating spot does NOT include individual tickets which are $10 per person at the gate.

 

Hope to see you there!!
item.how_to_find_us: TBD closer to the date, but we'll have a tailgating spot!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Polo match in Newport
